title: Improvement Science-Based Instructional Design for Strengthening Preservice Teachers' Field Experience

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational teacher professional knowledge, basic classroom management principles, and language subject instruction methods
context.additional_context: Program Combining Project-Based Assessment and Field Practical Experience, Conducted in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can enhance their lesson design and implementation competencies using a standardized Plan-Observe-Probe (POP) cycle protocol within 8 weeks
Learners can write lesson improvement plans reflecting coaching feedback with 80% accuracy through four cycles of field practicum
Participants derive three or more resolution strategies for unpredictable situations occurring in language classroom settings using a structured reflective journal (POP-Reflection Form).

resources: Language curriculum standard lesson video samples
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
